front.title: PIM-SM Multicast Routing Security Issues and Enhancements

abstract.t: This memo describes security threats for the larger (intra-domain, orinter-domain) multicast routing infrastructures. Only ProtocolIndependent Multicast - Sparse Mode (PIM-SM) is analyzed, in itsthree main operational modes: the traditional Any Source Multicast(ASM) model, Source-Specific Multicast (SSM) model, and the ASM modelenhanced by the Embedded RP group-to-RP mapping mechanism. This memoalso describes enhancements to the protocol operations to mitigatethese threats.
